pages.title: Coins, Gems and Pearls
pages.text: Some loot you may find or harvest are coins, gems, or pearls.$(br)$(bold)Coins$()$(br)- Gold Coin (rare)$()$(br)- Silver Coin (common) $(br)$(bold)Gems$()$(br)There are two kinds of gems - Ruby and Sapphire, which are both equal in value.$(br)$(bold)Pearls$()$(br)There are two kinds of pearls, white & black.
These items can be thrown into Wishing Wells to obtain treasure.
